articles.content: Ronnie OSullivan has sent a warning to Mark Allen following the 36-year-olds UK Championship victory. The Rocket watched on as his rivals sparkling form continued to win his maiden title at the event… [+2761 chars]

articles.author: Kris Boyd
articles.title: Giovanni van Bronckhorst sacked by Rangers: What contributed to the Dutchman's departure from Ibrox? - Sky Sports
articles.description: Where did it all go wrong for Giovanni van Bronckhorst as he parts ways with Rangers after one year in charge?
articles.content:
Giovanni van Bronckhorst's sacking was perhaps inevitable after Rangers' draw at St Mirren two weeks ago.
With the club facing an uphill task to overhaul Celtic's nine-point lead in the Scottish Pre… [+7113 chars]

articles.author: Chris Jewers
articles.title: Female TV reporter Dominique Metzger is robbed live on air at Qatar World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: Argentinian reporter Dominique Metzger was broadcasting from the Corniche area of Doha in the build up to the first match when she says items from her handbag were stolen.
articles.content:
A female Argentinian television reporter was robbed live on air while reporting in Qatar on the World Cup, with money and documents stolen from her handbag.
Dominique Metzger was broadcasting from t… [+7299 chars]

articles.author: Martin Robinson, Vivek Chaudhary, Shekhar Bhatia, Sami Mokbel
articles.title: England fans hunt for a £12 pints in Qatar ahead of Iran World Cup 2022 opener - Daily Mail
articles.description: Thousands of England fans have descended on Qatar and have managed to sniff out £12 pints ahead of  the first match of the World Cup.
articles.content: Thousands of England fans have descended on Qatar and have managed to sniff out £12 pints ahead of the team's first match of the World Cup today but some told MailOnline their trips have cost £50,000… [+31851 chars]
